alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:33PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy Downpours May Result in Street Flooding in Urban and Poor Drainage Areas in the Boston to Providence Interstate 95 Corridor... At 1126 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy downpours along the Boston, MA to Providence, RI Interstate 95 corridor. These downpours moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor, nuisance flooding along with poor visibility in heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated and gage reports. Rain has fallen at a rate of up to one inch per hour in Westerly, RI. IMPACT...Nuisance street flooding of typically flood prone, urban and poor drainage areas. Small creeks may rise rapidly due to the accumulation of heavy rain. Locations impacted include... Boston, Providence, Cambridge, Brockton, Quincy, Fall River, Newton, Warwick, Cranston, Somerville, Pawtucket, Framingham, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Taunton, Weymouth, Revere and East Providence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Pockets of street flooding are anticipated as rain continues to fall. Do not drive where water covers the road.
